Container.Name: radarrsync
Container.Overview: RadarrSync Syncs two Radarr servers through web API. This is a modified version designed to be run in a docker container. This version supports only two servers. [br][br] RADARR_URL -> The endpoint of your radarr server [br] RADARR_KEY -> The API key for your radarr server [br] RADARR4K_URL -> The endpoint of your radarr server you want to sync to [br] RADARR4K_KEY -> The API key for this server [br] PROFILE_ID -> The profile number you want the video to be added with. (Start counting from Any:1 SD:2 ect Ultra-HD is normally 5. ) [br][br] [b]Ensure that the root path is the same on both servers. ie /movie[b]
